summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2564 for the improvement of Seventh Avenue North, from South line of Westlake Boulevard Addition to Crockett Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and by providing for the necessary surface drainage and by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 29823, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
